entry.title: XWorm RAT: Full Malware Analysis & Behavioral Breakdown

link.title: XWorm RAT: Full Malware Analysis & Behavioral Breakdown

entry.summary: XWorm RAT XWorm is a MaaS multifunctional RAT that was first discovered in 2022 with wide range of capabilities. sample hash: e4c179fa5bc03b07e64e65087afcbad04d40475204ebb0a0bc7d77f071222656 malware bazzar: bazaar.abuse.ch/sample/e4c179fa5bc03b07e64e65087afcbad04d40475204ebb0a0bc7d77f071222656 static analysis this PowerShell script was sort of interesting, if we looked closely we would find ...
